brainly_data.question:
Which of the following is small Java code script that adds functionality to web pages in a browser?

Applet
Imperative
Paradigm
Python
brainly_data.subject: Computers and technology

all_answers.question:
Which of the following is small Java code script that adds functionality to web pages in a browser?

Applet
Imperative
Paradigm
Python
all_answers.subject: Computers and technology
all_answers.text: The small Java code script that adds functionality to web pages in a browser is Applet. An applet is a Java program that runs in a Web browser. It is a small application that is written in the Java programming language.
